EmailTemplate.name: Mass Notice to Users
EmailTemplate.subject: Salesforce - System Upgrade this Weekend
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Receiving_User.FirstName}:
Salesforce will be implementing an upgrade this weekend. When you log into the system on Monday the 17th and access the Reports tab, you'll notice a very different interface.
This enhancement will allow you to create and customize reports in a faster, easier manner.
If you have any questions, please contact me at ext. 4274.
Regards, Andrew
